019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.Gson;
022import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery.APIResource;
023import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
024import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
025import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesObject;
026import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
029import io.kubernetes.client.util.Strings;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
031import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
032import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
033import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
034import java.util.ArrayList;
035import java.util.Collection;
036import java.util.Optional;
037import java.util.function.Function;
038
039/**
040 * A stub for namespaced custom objects. This stub provides the
041 * functions common to all Kubernetes objects, but uses variables
042 * for all types. This class should be used as base class only.
043 *
044 * @param <O> the generic type
045 * @param <L> the generic type
046 */
047@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
048public class K8sGenericStub<O extends KubernetesObject,
049        L extends KubernetesListObject> {
050    protected final K8sClient client;
051    private final GenericKubernetesApi<O, L> api;
052    protected final String group;
053    protected final String version;
054    protected final String kind;
055    protected final String plural;
056    protected final String namespace;
057    protected final String name;
058
059    /**
060     * Get a namespaced object stub. If the version in parameter
061     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object 
062     * found with matching group and kind. 
063     *
064     * @param <O> the object type
065     * @param <L> the object list type
066     * @param <R> the stub type
067     * @param objectClass the object class
068     * @param objectListClass the object list class
069     * @param client the client
070     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
071     * @param namespace the namespace
072     * @param name the name
073     * @param provider the provider
074     * @return the stub if the object exists
075     * @throws ApiException the api exception
076     */
077    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
078        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
079    public static <O extends KubernetesObject, L extends KubernetesListObject,
080            R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>>
081            R get(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
082                    K8sClient client, GroupVersionKind gvk, String namespace,
083                    String name, GenericSupplier<O, L, R> provider)
084                    throws ApiException {
085        var context = K8s.context(client, gvk.getGroup(), gvk.getVersion(),
086            gvk.getKind());
087        if (context.isEmpty()) {
088            throw new ApiException("No known API for " + gvk.getGroup()
089                + "/" + gvk.getVersion() + " " + gvk.getKind());
090        }
091        return provider.get(objectClass, objectListClass, client, context.get(),
092            namespace, name);
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * Get a namespaced object stub.
097     *
098     * @param <O> the object type
099     * @param <L> the object list type
100     * @param <R> the stub type
101     * @param objectClass the object class
102     * @param objectListClass the object list class
103     * @param client the client
104     * @param context the context
105     * @param namespace the namespace
106     * @param name the name
107     * @param provider the provider
108     * @return the stub if the object exists
109     * @throws ApiException the api exception
110     */
111    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
112        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
113    public static <O extends KubernetesObject, L extends KubernetesListObject,
114            R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>>
115            R get(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
116                    K8sClient client, APIResource context, String namespace,
117                    String name, GenericSupplier<O, L, R> provider)
118                    throws ApiException {
119        return provider.get(objectClass, objectListClass, client,
120            context, namespace, name);
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Get a namespaced object stub for a newly created object.
125     *
126     * @param <O> the object type
127     * @param <L> the object list type
128     * @param <R> the stub type
129     * @param objectClass the object class
130     * @param objectListClass the object list class
131     * @param client the client
132     * @param context the context
133     * @param model the model
134     * @param provider the provider
135     * @return the stub if the object exists
136     * @throws ApiException the api exception
137     */
138    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
139        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
140    public static <O extends KubernetesObject, L extends KubernetesListObject,
141            R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>>
142            R create(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
143                    K8sClient client, APIResource context, O model,
144                    GenericSupplier<O, L, R> provider) throws ApiException {
145        var api = new GenericKubernetesApi<>(objectClass, objectListClass,
146            context.getGroup(), context.getPreferredVersion(),
147            context.getResourcePlural(), client);
148        api.create(model).throwsApiException();
149        return provider.get(objectClass, objectListClass, client,
150            context, model.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
151            model.getMetadata().getName());
152    }
153
154    /**
155     * Get the stubs for the objects in the given namespace that match
156     * the criteria from the given options.
157     *
158     * @param <O> the object type
159     * @param <L> the object list type
160     * @param <R> the stub type
161     * @param objectClass the object class
162     * @param objectListClass the object list class
163     * @param client the client
164     * @param context the context
165     * @param namespace the namespace
166     * @param options the options
167     * @param provider the provider
168     * @return the collection
169     * @throws ApiException the api exception
170     */
171    public static <O extends KubernetesObject, L extends KubernetesListObject,
172            R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>>
173            Collection<R> list(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
174                    K8sClient client, APIResource context, String namespace,
175                    ListOptions options, SpecificSupplier<O, L, R> provider)
176                    throws ApiException {
177        var api = new GenericKubernetesApi<>(objectClass, objectListClass,
178            context.getGroup(), context.getPreferredVersion(),
179            context.getResourcePlural(), client);
180        var objs = api.list(namespace, options).throwsApiException();
181        var result = new ArrayList<R>();
182        for (var item : objs.getObject().getItems()) {
183            result.add(
184                provider.get(client, namespace, item.getMetadata().getName()));
185        }
186        return result;
187    }
188
189    /**
190     * Instantiates a new namespaced custom object stub.
191     *
192     * @param objectClass the object class
193     * @param objectListClass the object list class
194     * @param client the client
195     * @param context the context
196     * @param namespace the namespace
197     * @param name the name
198     */
199    protected K8sGenericStub(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
200            K8sClient client, APIResource context, String namespace,
201            String name) {
202        this.client = client;
203        group = context.getGroup();
204        version = context.getPreferredVersion();
205        kind = context.getKind();
206        plural = context.getResourcePlural();
207        this.namespace = namespace;
208        this.name = name;
209
210        Gson gson = client.getJSON().getGson();
211        if (!checkAdapters(client)) {
212            client.getJSON().setGson(gson.newBuilder()
213                .registerTypeAdapterFactory(
214                    new K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory())
215                .create());
216        }
217        api = new GenericKubernetesApi<>(objectClass,
218            objectListClass, group, version, plural, client);
219    }
220
221    private boolean checkAdapters(ApiClient client) {
222        return K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory.K8sDynamicModelCreator.class
223            .equals(client.getJSON().getGson().getAdapter(K8sDynamicModel.class)
224                .getClass())
225            && K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory.K8sDynamicModelsCreator.class
226                .equals(client.getJSON().getGson()
227                    .getAdapter(K8sDynamicModels.class).getClass());
228    }
229
230    /**
231     * Gets the group.
232     *
233     * @return the group
234     */
235    public String group() {
236        return group;
237    }
238
239    /**
240     * Gets the version.
241     *
242     * @return the version
243     */
244    public String version() {
245        return version;
246    }
247
248    /**
249     * Gets the kind.
250     *
251     * @return the kind
252     */
253    public String kind() {
254        return kind;
255    }
256
257    /**
258     * Gets the plural.
259     *
260     * @return the plural
261     */
262    public String plural() {
263        return plural;
264    }
265
266    /**
267     * Gets the namespace.
268     *
269     * @return the namespace
270     */
271    public String namespace() {
272        return namespace;
273    }
274
275    /**
276     * Gets the name.
277     *
278     * @return the name
279     */
280    public String name() {
281        return name;
282    }
283
284    /**
285     * Delete the Kubernetes object.
286     *
287     * @throws ApiException the API exception
288     */
289    public void delete() throws ApiException {
290        var result = api.delete(namespace, name);
291        if (result.isSuccess()
292            || result.getHttpStatusCode() == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_NOT_FOUND) {
293            return;
294        }
295        result.throwsApiException();
296    }
297
298    /**
299     * Retrieves and returns the current state of the object.
300     *
301     * @return the object's state
302     * @throws ApiException the api exception
303     */
304    public Optional<O> model() throws ApiException {
305        return K8s.optional(api.get(namespace, name));
306    }
307
308    /**
309     * Updates the object's status.
310     *
311     * @param object the current state of the object (passed to `status`)
312     * @param status function that returns the new status
313     * @return the updated model or empty if not successful
314     * @throws ApiException the api exception
315     */
316    public Optional<O> updateStatus(O object,
317            Function<O, Object> status) throws ApiException {
318        return K8s.optional(api.updateStatus(object, status));
319    }
320
321    /**
322     * Updates the status.
323     *
324     * @param status the status
325     * @return the kubernetes api response
326     * the updated model or empty if not successful
327     * @throws ApiException the api exception
328     */
329    public Optional<O> updateStatus(Function<O, Object> status)
330            throws ApiException {
331        return updateStatus(
332            api.get(namespace, name).throwsApiException().getObject(), status);
333    }
334
335    /**
336     * Patch the object.
337     *
338     * @param patchType the patch type
339     * @param patch the patch
340     * @param options the options
341     * @return the kubernetes api response
342     * @throws ApiException the api exception
343     */
344    public Optional<O> patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch,
345            PatchOptions options) throws ApiException {
346        return K8s
347            .optional(api.patch(namespace, name, patchType, patch, options));
348    }
349
350    /**
351     * Patch the object using default options.
352     *
353     * @param patchType the patch type
354     * @param patch the patch
355     * @return the kubernetes api response
356     * @throws ApiException the api exception
357     */
358    public Optional<O>
359            patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch) throws ApiException {
360        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
361        return patch(patchType, patch, opts);
362    }
363
364    /**
365     * A supplier for generic stubs.
366     *
367     * @param <O> the object type
368     * @param <L> the object list type
369     * @param <R> the result type
370     */
371    public interface GenericSupplier<O extends KubernetesObject,
372            L extends KubernetesListObject, R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>> {
373
374        /**
375         * Gets a new stub.
376         *
377         * @param objectClass the object class
378         * @param objectListClass the object list class
379         * @param client the client
380         * @param context the API resource
381         * @param namespace the namespace
382         * @param name the name
383         * @return the result
384         */
385        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI")
386        R get(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass, K8sClient client,
387                APIResource context, String namespace, String name);
388    }
389
390    /**
391     * A supplier for specific stubs.
392     *
393     * @param <O> the object type
394     * @param <L> the object list type
395     * @param <R> the result type
396     */
397    public interface SpecificSupplier<O extends KubernetesObject,
398            L extends KubernetesListObject, R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>> {
399
400        /**
401         * Gets a new stub.
402         *
403         * @param client the client
404         * @param namespace the namespace
405         * @param name the name
406         * @return the result
407         */
408        R get(K8sClient client, String namespace, String name);
409    }
410
411    @Override
412    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseLocaleWithCaseConversions")
413    public String toString() {
414        return (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(group) ? "" : group + "/")
415            + version.toUpperCase() + kind + " " + namespace + ":" + name;
416    }
417
418}
